instructions:
Place 3 cups lettuce in bottom of large bowl, sprinkle with salt, pepper and sugar. Layer sliced eggs on
top of lettuce, sprinkle with more salt. Layer in order: peas, remaining lettuce, bacon and Swiss cheese.
Spread mayonnaise over top, seal to edge of bowl. Cover and chill 24 hours. Garnish with green onions and
paprika. Toss before serving. Serves 12 to 15.
ingredients: 1 lb bacon, cooked crisp, drained, crumbled
1/4 cup sliced green onions with tops
name: 24 Hour Salad
creator: Good Housekeeping
